definition: Bayan Nur prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Bayan Nur prefecture-level city in Inner Mongolia

sentences.english: Ultimately, it is good for healthy and orderly development of Bayannur's small towns.
sentences.chinese: 最終促進巴彥淖爾市小城鎮健康有序的發展。

sentences.english: In the third part, the writer analyses the status quo of high school mathematics education in the city of Bayannaor.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分分析了巴彥淖爾市普通高中數學教育現狀。
